did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Promotional textual material relating to Suzanne Treister's project, "Hexen 2039: new military-occult technologies for psychological warfare, a Rosalind Brodsky research programme".

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Promotional textual material relating to Suzanne Treister's project, "Hexen 2039: new military-occult technologies for psychological warfare, a Rosalind Brodsky research programme", curated by Tania Nasielski and shown in London, United Kingdom in 2006.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Rose Goldsen Archive of New Media Art.

odd.head: NOTES
odd.p: Forms part of the Rose Goldsen Archive of New Media Art.
